Summary: large round object flys over me while in my drivewaycoming home from work
divs: sighting detailsi live in salem new hampshire and work in downtown boston it's about a 37 mile commute one way and i do it every day. it was about 2:30 mabey a little later in the morning {am}there was nothing unusal about the night very normal night i come home ,sometimes i stop and look up at how brilent the night sky sometimes is and just then from my left comes this round yellow \orange ball low in the sky above the tree tops moving at a good clip, east to west toward nashua, it was flying parallal with rt 28 the major road that runs through salem n.h, i am curious if any one else saw this thing. p.s have there been any metor crashes in the past 24 months east to west flight path just thinking! sincerly donald roche
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around September 15th 2011
